context.p: On the Define new password page, you can enter a new password that is to replace your current password.

step.cmd: Enter the new password and repeat the new password.

info.p: The minimum password length is 6 characters, the maximum length is 100 characters.

step.cmd: To save the new password, click Change.

result.p: The new password is saved. Use it when logging in again.
You are forwarded to the Login page, and you are sent an email confirming that you have successfully changed your password.
